translation:
Reply to the Most Illustrious and Excellent Sir

On the 28th of the previous month, I received the official letter from Your Excellency.

Along with it, Your Excellency has Rs. 57$000, signed by me, and in due time I will comply with the part concerning collection and remittance, regarding which allow me, Your Excellency.

God keep Your Excellency.

Fazenda do Salso, October 12, 1837.

(a) Inácio José de Oliveira Guimarães.

[On the verso of leaf 1 of document CV-227]
